description: Italy's leaders condemn a series of incidents affecting Chinese students and tourists.
title: Coronavirus: Chinese targeted as Italians panic
title_page: Coronavirus: Chinese targeted as Italians panic - BBC News
maintext: "Usually 50 or 60 people come here for dinner," she says, "but last Saturday there were two. I've already had to let go of the three staff helping my husband and me. If it goes on like this, I'll have to close next month."
